channel.title: Vestibule :: Suggestions for "Down the rb_newobj() Rabbit Hole: Garbage Collection and a Glimpse into Ruby's Future"
channel.description: A list of all suggestions made for "Down the rb_newobj() Rabbit Hole: Garbage Collection and a Glimpse into Ruby's Future"

item.title: Suggestion from Zachary Scott (@zzak)
item.description:
Yes!!!

I wish I could vote for this more than once!

item.title: Suggestion from John Pagonis (@)
item.description:
Jan's suggestion was what I was thinking as well.

This looks really promising :-)

item.title: Suggestion from Jan Stępień (@)
item.description: It would be great to see a short overview of approaches to garbage collection in other Ruby implementations and a comparison with MRI's GC, if time allows.
